amendment.description: Amendment sought to restrict funds tranferred to the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection's ability to regulate pre-dispute arbitration agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 236 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 236 (Roll no. 360).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Ellison.
